name: SubmissionType
title: Submission Type
description: Categories that describe the nature of a coverage request sent from a broker to a carrier.

concept.definition: A request for coverage on an account not previously written by the target carrier.
A request to continue coverage on an existing account for a new term.
A request to move an existing account from its current carrier to a different carrier.
A request for pricing on changes to an existing policy during the current term.

designation.value: Demande de soumission en cours de terme
Solicitud de cotización a medio plazo

concept.definition: A preliminary request for approximate pricing before a formal submission, often with limited underwriting information.
